QuestData.Title: Halls of Valor: Odyn's Challenge
QuestData.Description:
Odyn himself sends a message. He and his warriors await worthy contenders within the Halls of Valor.
Defeat the champions of the Halls of Valor, and claim glory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Odyn in the Halls of Valor.

Objectives.Objective: Defeat Odyn in Halls of Valor
